blocks.name: coinfliplem
blocks.content: Division in the extended real numbers can be used for the coin-flip example. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm coinfliplem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(c0, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cxdiv), nat2))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wne(c1, c2)
  -| wceq(c0, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2))
  -| wceq(c3, cpr(cop(c1, nat1), cop(c2, nat0)))
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cxdiv), nat2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cxdiv), nat2)), wne(c1, c2))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cxdiv), nat2)), wceq(c3, cpr(cop(c1, nat1), cop(c2, nat0))))
  eqtr4i(c0, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cxdiv), nat2), co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2))
  ax-mp(wceq(co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cxdiv), nat2), co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2)), wcel(c1, universe))
  ofcfeqd2(hs0, hs1, cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cxdiv, nat2, cdiv, cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), cr, cfn, cr, wcel(c1, universe))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cv(hs0)), cr, cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cv(hs0)), cfv(chash, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))
  fvres(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), chash)
  nn0red(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))), wcel(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), cfn), wss(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)))
  elpwid(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))))
  simpr(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))
  ssfi(cpr(c1, c2), cv(hs0))
  hashcl(cv(hs0))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cxdiv, nat2), co(cv(hs1), cdiv, nat2)), wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(nat2, cr), wne(nat2, nat0))
  simpr(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs1), cr))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wcel(nat2, cr))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  rexdiv(cv(hs1), nat2)
  a1i(wcel(c1, universe), wfn(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))
  hashresfn(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))
  a1i(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), cfn))
  mpbi(wcel(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), cfn), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), cfn))
  prfi(c1, c2)
  pwfi(cpr(c1, c2))
  a1i(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))
  diff.hs0.c(cxdiv)
  diff.hs0.c(nat2)
  diff.hs0.c(cdiv)
  diff.hs1.c(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))
  diff.hs1.c(cxdiv)
  diff.hs1.c(nat2)
  diff.hs1.c(cdiv)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, universe))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c1, universe))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm coinfliplem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ c0 =((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(/e)]2)
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ≠ c2
  ⊣ c0 =((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(÷)]2)
  ⊣ c3 = { < c1, 1 >, < c2, 0 > }
} = {
  a1ii(c0 =((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(/e)]2), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1ii(c0 =((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(/e)]2), c1 ≠ c2)
  a1ii(c0 =((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(/e)]2), c3 = { < c1, 1 >, < c2, 0 > })
  eqtr4i(c0, ((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(/e)]2), ((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(÷)]2))
  ax-mp(((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(/e)]2)=((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(÷)]2), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ofcfeqd2(hs0, hs1, (# |` P({ c1, c2 })), cxdiv, nat2, cdiv, P({ c1, c2 }), cr, cfn, cr, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltrd(((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))` hs0), cr, (# ` hs0), (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs0 ∈ P({ c1, c2 })))
  syl((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs0 ∈ P({ c1, c2 })), ((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))` hs0)=(# ` hs0), hs0 ∈ P({ c1, c2 }))
  fvres(hs0, P({ c1, c2 }), chash)
  nn0red((# ` hs0), (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs0 ∈ P({ c1, c2 })))
  syl((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs0 ∈ P({ c1, c2 })), (# ` hs0)∈ ℕ0, hs0 ∈ Fin)
  sylancr((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs0 ∈ P({ c1, c2 })), hs0 ∈ Fin, { c1, c2 } ∈ Fin, hs0 ⊆ { c1, c2 })
  elpwid(hs0, { c1, c2 }, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs0 ∈ P({ c1, c2 })))
  simpr(c1 ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ∈ P({ c1, c2 }))
  ssfi({ c1, c2 }, hs0)
  hashcl(hs0)
  syl3anc((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), (hs1[/e]2)=(hs1[÷]2), hs1 ∈ ℝ, 2 ∈ ℝ, 2 ≠ 0)
  simpr(c1 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ ℝ)
  a1i((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), 2 ∈ ℝ)
  a1i((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), 2 ≠ 0)
  2ne0()
  rexdiv(hs1, nat2)
  a1i(c1 ∈ 𝕌, (# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[Fn]P({ c1, c2 }))
  hashresfn(P({ c1, c2 }))
  a1i(c1 ∈ 𝕌, P({ c1, c2 })∈ Fin)
  mpbi(P({ c1, c2 })∈ Fin, { c1, c2 } ∈ Fin)
  prfi(c1, c2)
  pwfi({ c1, c2 })
  a1i(c1 ∈ 𝕌, 2 ∈ ℝ)
  2re()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((# |` P({ c1, c2 })))
  diff.hs0.c(cxdiv)
  diff.hs0.c(nat2)
  diff.hs0.c(cdiv)
  diff.hs1.c((# |` P({ c1, c2 })))
  diff.hs1.c(cxdiv)
  diff.hs1.c(nat2)
  diff.hs1.c(cdiv)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  diff.hs1.w(c1 ∈ 𝕌)
}

blocks.name: coinflipprob
blocks.content: The ` P ` we defined for coin-flip is a probability law. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm coinflipprob(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wcel(c0, cprb)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wne(c1, c2)
  -| wceq(c0, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2))
  -| wceq(c3, cpr(cop(c1, nat1), cop(c2, nat0)))
} = {
  eqeltri(c0, cprb, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cxdiv), cfv(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))))
  eqtr4i(c0, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cxdiv), cfv(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))), co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cxdiv), nat2))
  coinfliplem(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  oveq2i(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cxdiv), cfv(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))), nat2)
  mp2an(wcel(co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cxdiv), cfv(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))), cprb), wcel(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cfv(cmeas, cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))), wcel(cfv(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))), crp))
  ax-mp(wcel(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cfv(cmeas, cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), universe))
  pwcntmeas(cpr(c1, c2), universe)
  eqeltri(cfv(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))), crp, nat2)
  3eqtri(cfv(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))), nat2, cfv(chash, cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))), cfv(chash, cpr(c1, c2)))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))), cfv(chash, cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))), wcel(cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))
  eqeltri(cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), cpr(c1, c2))
  pwid(cpr(c1, c2))
  prex(c1, c2)
  fvres(cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), chash)
  fveq2i(chash, cuni(cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cpr(c1, c2))
  unipw(cpr(c1, c2))
  mpbi(wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(c1, c2)), nat2), wne(c1, c2))
  mp2an(wb(wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(chash, cpr(c1, c2)), nat2)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  hashprg(c1, universe, c2, universe)
  2rp()
  probfinmeasb(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))
}

blocks.name: coinflipspace
blocks.content: The space of our coin-flip probability. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm coinflipspace(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cdm(c0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wne(c1, c2)
  -| wceq(c0, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2))
  -| wceq(c3, cpr(cop(c1, nat1), cop(c2, nat0)))
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(cdm(c0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), wcel(c2, universe))
  a1ii(wceq(cdm(c0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), wne(c1, c2))
  a1ii(wceq(cdm(c0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), wceq(c3, cpr(cop(c1, nat1), cop(c2, nat0))))
  eqtri(cdm(c0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), cdm(co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2)))
  dmeqi(c0, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2))
  mp2b(wceq(cdm(co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2)), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), wcel(c1, universe), wfn(co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))
  ofcfn(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cdiv, nat2, cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), universe, cr, wcel(c1, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c1, universe), wfn(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))
  hashresfn(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))
  mp1i(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), universe), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), universe))
  prex(c1, c2)
  pwexg(cpr(c1, c2), universe)
  a1i(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  fndm(co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))
}

blocks.name: coinflipuniv
blocks.content: The universe of our coin-flip probability is ` { H , T } ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Jan-2017.)

blocks.name: coinfliprv
blocks.content: The ` X ` we defined for coin-flip is a random variable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm coinfliprv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1))
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wne(c2, c3)
  -| wceq(c1, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c2, c3))), cofc(cdiv), nat2))
  -| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(c2, nat1), cop(c3, nat0)))
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1)), wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr), wral(hs0, cbrsiga, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(c1))))
  mp2an(wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr), wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cpr(nat1, nat0)), wss(cpr(nat1, nat0), cr))
  mpbir(wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cpr(nat1, nat0)), wf(c0, cpr(c2, c3), cpr(nat1, nat0)))
  feq2i(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cpr(nat1, nat0), cpr(c2, c3))
  coinflipuniv(c1, c2, c3, c0)
  mpbi(wss(cpr(nat1, nat0), cr), wa(wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(nat0, cr)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  1re()
  0re()
  prss(nat1, cr, nat0)
  fss(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cpr(nat1, nat0), cr)
  rgen(hs0, cbrsiga, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(c1)))
  mp1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cbrsiga), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(c1)), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cpr(c2, c3)))
  sseqtri(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cpr(c2, c3), crn(ccnv(c0)))
  imassrn(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0))
  eqtr3i(crn(ccnv(c0)), cpr(c2, c3), cdm(c0))
  dfdm4(c0)
  fdmi(c0, cpr(c2, c3), cpr(nat1, nat0))
  mpbir(wf(c0, cpr(c2, c3), cpr(nat1, nat0)), wf(cpr(cop(c2, nat1), cop(c3, nat0)), cpr(c2, c3), cpr(nat1, nat0)))
  ax-mp(wf(cpr(cop(c2, nat1), cop(c3, nat0)), cpr(c2, c3), cpr(nat1, nat0)), wne(c2, c3))
  fpr(c2, c3, nat1, nat0)
  1ex()
  c0ex()
  feq1i(c0, cpr(c2, c3), cpr(nat1, nat0), cpr(cop(c2, nat1), cop(c3, nat0)))
  biimpi(wss(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cpr(c2, c3)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(c1)))
  bitr2i(wss(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cpr(c2, c3)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cpw(cpr(c2, c3))))
  eleq2i(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(c1), cpw(cpr(c2, c3)))
  coinflipspace(c1, c2, c3, c0)
  elpw(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cpr(c2, c3))
  mp2b(wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(ccnv(c0), universe))
  eqeltri(c0, universe, cpr(cop(c2, nat1), cop(c3, nat0)))
  prex(cop(c2, nat1), cop(c3, nat0))
  cnvexg(c0, universe)
  imaexg(ccnv(c0), universe, cv(hs0))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1)), wa(wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr), wral(hs0, cbrsiga, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cdm(c1))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  isrrvv(hs0, c0, c1, wcel(c2, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c1, cprb))
  coinflipprob(c1, c2, c3, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm coinfliprv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ c0 ∈(rRndVar ` c1)
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c3 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ≠ c3
  ⊣ c1 =((# |` P({ c2, c3 }))[oFC(÷)]2)
  ⊣ c0 = { < c2, 1 >, < c3, 0 > }
} = {
  mpbir2an(c0 ∈(rRndVar ` c1), (c0 : ⋃ dom(c1)→ ℝ), ∀(hs0 ∈ BrSiga,(`' c0 " hs0)∈ dom(c1)))
  mp2an((c0 : ⋃ dom(c1)→ ℝ), (c0 : ⋃ dom(c1)→ { 1, 0 }), { 1, 0 } ⊆ ℝ)
  mpbir((c0 : ⋃ dom(c1)→ { 1, 0 }), (c0 : { c2, c3 } → { 1, 0 }))
  feq2i(c0, ⋃ dom(c1), { 1, 0 }, { c2, c3 })
  coinflipuniv(c1, c2, c3, c0)
  mpbi({ 1, 0 } ⊆ ℝ, (1 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0 ∈ ℝ))
  pm3.2i(1 ∈ ℝ, 0 ∈ ℝ)
  1re()
  0re()
  prss(nat1, cr, nat0)
  fss(c0, ⋃ dom(c1), { 1, 0 }, cr)
  rgen(hs0, cbrsiga, (`' c0 " hs0)∈ dom(c1))
  mp1i(hs0 ∈ BrSiga, (`' c0 " hs0)∈ dom(c1), (`' c0 " hs0)⊆ { c2, c3 })
  sseqtri((`' c0 " hs0), { c2, c3 }, ran(`' c0))
  imassrn(`' c0, hs0)
  eqtr3i(ran(`' c0), { c2, c3 }, dom(c0))
  dfdm4(c0)
  fdmi(c0, { c2, c3 }, { 1, 0 })
  mpbir((c0 : { c2, c3 } → { 1, 0 }), ({ < c2, 1 >, < c3, 0 > } : { c2, c3 } → { 1, 0 }))
  ax-mp(({ < c2, 1 >, < c3, 0 > } : { c2, c3 } → { 1, 0 }), c2 ≠ c3)
  fpr(c2, c3, nat1, nat0)
  1ex()
  c0ex()
  feq1i(c0, { c2, c3 }, { 1, 0 }, { < c2, 1 >, < c3, 0 > })
  biimpi((`' c0 " hs0)⊆ { c2, c3 }, (`' c0 " hs0)∈ dom(c1))
  bitr2i((`' c0 " hs0)⊆ { c2, c3 }, (`' c0 " hs0)∈ dom(c1), (`' c0 " hs0)∈ P({ c2, c3 }))
  eleq2i((`' c0 " hs0), dom(c1), P({ c2, c3 }))
  coinflipspace(c1, c2, c3, c0)
  elpw((`' c0 " hs0), { c2, c3 })
  mp2b((`' c0 " hs0)∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌, `' c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltri(c0, universe, { < c2, 1 >, < c3, 0 > })
  prex(< c2, 1 >, < c3, 0 >)
  cnvexg(c0, universe)
  imaexg(`' c0, universe, hs0)
  ax-mp((c0 ∈(rRndVar ` c1)↔((c0 : ⋃ dom(c1)→ ℝ)∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ BrSiga,(`' c0 " hs0)∈ dom(c1)))), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  isrrvv(hs0, c0, c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(c2 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ Prob)
  coinflipprob(c1, c2, c3, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: coinflippv
blocks.content: The probability of heads is one-half. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm coinflippv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wne(c1, c2)
  -| wceq(c0, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2))
  -| wceq(c3, cpr(cop(c1, nat1), cop(c2, nat0)))
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  a1ii(wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wne(c1, c2))
  a1ii(wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wceq(c3, cpr(cop(c1, nat1), cop(c2, nat0))))
  eqtri(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cfv(co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2), csn(c1)))
  fveq1i(c0, csn(c1), co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2))
  mp2b(wceq(cfv(co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2), csn(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wss(csn(c1), cpr(c1, c2)), wcel(csn(c1), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))
  snsspr1(c1, c2)
  biimpri(wss(csn(c1), cpr(c1, c2)), wcel(csn(c1), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))
  elpw2(csn(c1), cpr(c1, c2))
  fvmpt(hs0, csn(c1), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cdiv, nat2))
  oveq1d(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cdiv, nat2, nat1, wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  syl6eq(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), nat1, cfv(chash, csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), csn(c1), chash)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(chash, csn(c1)), nat1), wcel(c1, universe))
  hashsng(c1, universe)
  ax-mp(wceq(co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cofc(cdiv), nat2), cmpt(hs0, cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), co(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cdiv, nat2))), wcel(c1, universe))
  ofcfval2(hs0, cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), cdiv, nat2, cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), universe, cn0, cn0, wcel(c1, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), universe))
  pwex(cpr(c1, c2))
  prex(c1, c2)
  a1i(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(nat2, cn0))
  2nn0()
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))), wcel(cfv(chash, cv(hs0)), cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))
  adantl(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn))
  sylancr(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfn), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), cfn), wss(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)))
  prfi(c1, c2)
  elpwi(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2))
  ssfi(cpr(c1, c2), cv(hs0))
  hashcl(cv(hs0))
  feqresmpt(hs0, chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), universe, cun(cn0, csn(cpnf)), wcel(c1, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c1, universe), wf(chash, universe, cun(cn0, csn(cpnf))))
  hashf()
  a1i(wcel(c1, universe), wss(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)), universe))
  ssv(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))
  ovex(nat1, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cpr(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  diff.hs0.c(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c1, c2))))
  diff.hs0.c(cdiv)
  diff.hs0.c(nat2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, universe))
  diff.hs0.c(chash)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm coinflippv(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ` { c1 })=(1[÷]2)
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ≠ c2
  ⊣ c0 =((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(÷)]2)
  ⊣ c3 = { < c1, 1 >, < c2, 0 > }
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ` { c1 })=(1[÷]2), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1ii((c0 ` { c1 })=(1[÷]2), c1 ≠ c2)
  a1ii((c0 ` { c1 })=(1[÷]2), c3 = { < c1, 1 >, < c2, 0 > })
  eqtri((c0 ` { c1 }), (1[÷]2), (((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(÷)]2)` { c1 }))
  fveq1i(c0, { c1 }, ((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(÷)]2))
  mp2b((((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(÷)]2)` { c1 })=(1[÷]2), { c1 } ⊆ { c1, c2 }, { c1 } ∈ P({ c1, c2 }))
  snsspr1(c1, c2)
  biimpri({ c1 } ⊆ { c1, c2 }, { c1 } ∈ P({ c1, c2 }))
  elpw2({ c1 }, { c1, c2 })
  fvmpt(hs0, { c1 }, P({ c1, c2 }), ((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(÷)]2), (1[÷]2), ((# ` hs0)[÷]2))
  oveq1d((# ` hs0), cdiv, nat2, nat1, hs0 = { c1 })
  syl6eq((# ` hs0), nat1, (# ` { c1 }), hs0 = { c1 })
  fveq2(hs0, { c1 }, chash)
  ax-mp((# ` { c1 })= 1, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  hashsng(c1, universe)
  ax-mp(((# |` P({ c1, c2 }))[oFC(÷)]2)=(hs0 ∈ P({ c1, c2 })↦((# ` hs0)[÷]2)), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ofcfval2(hs0, (# |` P({ c1, c2 })), cdiv, nat2, P({ c1, c2 }), (# ` hs0), universe, cn0, cn0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(c1 ∈ 𝕌, P({ c1, c2 })∈ 𝕌)
  pwex({ c1, c2 })
  prex(c1, c2)
  a1i(c1 ∈ 𝕌, 2 ∈ ℕ0)
  2nn0()
  syl((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ hs0 ∈ P({ c1, c2 })), (# ` hs0)∈ ℕ0, hs0 ∈ Fin)
  adantl(c1 ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ∈ P({ c1, c2 }), hs0 ∈ Fin)
  sylancr(hs0 ∈ P({ c1, c2 }), hs0 ∈ Fin, { c1, c2 } ∈ Fin, hs0 ⊆ { c1, c2 })
  prfi(c1, c2)
  elpwi(hs0, { c1, c2 })
  ssfi({ c1, c2 }, hs0)
  hashcl(hs0)
  feqresmpt(hs0, chash, P({ c1, c2 }), universe, (ℕ0 ⋃ { +∞ }), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(c1 ∈ 𝕌, (# : 𝕌 →(ℕ0 ⋃ { +∞ })))
  hashf()
  a1i(c1 ∈ 𝕌, P({ c1, c2 })⊆ 𝕌)
  ssv(P({ c1, c2 }))
  ovex(nat1, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.hs0.c({ c1 })
  diff.hs0.c(P({ c1, c2 }))
  diff.hs0.c((1[÷]2))
  diff.hs0.c((# |` P({ c1, c2 })))
  diff.hs0.c(cdiv)
  diff.hs0.c(nat2)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  diff.hs0.c(chash)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
}

blocks.name: coinflippvt
blocks.content: The probability of tails is one-half. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm coinflippvt(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wne(c2, c1)
  -| wceq(c0, co(cres(chash, cpw(cpr(c2, c1))), cofc(cdiv), nat2))
  -| wceq(c3, cpr(cop(c2, nat1), cop(c1, nat0)))
} = {
  eqtri(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), co(nat1, cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))
  3eqtr3i(cfv(c0, csn(c1)), co(nat1, cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), csn(c2))), co(nat1, cmin, cfv(c0, csn(c2))))
  mp2an(wceq(cfv(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), csn(c2))), co(nat1, cmin, cfv(c0, csn(c2)))), wcel(c0, cprb), wcel(csn(c2), cdm(c0)))
  coinflipprob(c0, c2, c1, c3)
  eleqtrri(csn(c2), cdm(c0), cpw(cpr(c2, c1)))
  ax-mp(wcel(csn(c2), cpw(cpr(c2, c1))), wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c1)))
  prid1(c2, c1)
  snelpwi(c2, cpr(c2, c1))
  coinflipspace(c0, c2, c1, c3)
  probdsb(c0, csn(c2))
  fveq2i(c0, cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), csn(c2)), csn(c1))
  eqtri(cdif(cuni(cdm(c0)), csn(c2)), csn(c1), cdif(cpr(c2, c1), csn(c2)))
  difeq1i(cuni(cdm(c0)), csn(c2), cpr(c2, c1))
  coinflipuniv(c0, c2, c1, c3)
  ax-mp(wceq(cdif(cpr(c2, c1), csn(c2)), csn(c1)), wne(c2, c1))
  difprsn1(c2, c1)
  oveq2i(nat1, cmin, cfv(c0, csn(c2)), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
  coinflippv(c0, c2, c1, c3)
  1mhlfehlf()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm coinflippvt(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ` { c1 })=(1[÷]2)
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ≠ c1
  ⊣ c0 =((# |` P({ c2, c1 }))[oFC(÷)]2)
  ⊣ c3 = { < c2, 1 >, < c1, 0 > }
} = {
  eqtri((c0 ` { c1 }), (1[÷]2), (1[-](1[÷]2)))
  3eqtr3i((c0 ` { c1 }), (1[-](1[÷]2)), (c0 `(⋃ dom(c0)\ { c2 })), (1[-](c0 ` { c2 })))
  mp2an((c0 `(⋃ dom(c0)\ { c2 }))=(1[-](c0 ` { c2 })), c0 ∈ Prob, { c2 } ∈ dom(c0))
  coinflipprob(c0, c2, c1, c3)
  eleqtrri({ c2 }, dom(c0), P({ c2, c1 }))
  ax-mp({ c2 } ∈ P({ c2, c1 }), c2 ∈ { c2, c1 })
  prid1(c2, c1)
  snelpwi(c2, { c2, c1 })
  coinflipspace(c0, c2, c1, c3)
  probdsb(c0, { c2 })
  fveq2i(c0, (⋃ dom(c0)\ { c2 }), { c1 })
  eqtri((⋃ dom(c0)\ { c2 }), { c1 }, ({ c2, c1 } \ { c2 }))
  difeq1i(⋃ dom(c0), { c2 }, { c2, c1 })
  coinflipuniv(c0, c2, c1, c3)
  ax-mp(({ c2, c1 } \ { c2 })= { c1 }, c2 ≠ c1)
  difprsn1(c2, c1)
  oveq2i(nat1, cmin, (c0 ` { c2 }), (1[÷]2))
  coinflippv(c0, c2, c1, c3)
  1mhlfehlf()
}
